enb_long_title: Thirteenth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies of the UNFCCC
sentences: Delegates have been commenting on the irony of the timing of the crippling French transport strike.

Attendance at some of the sessions was affected on Thursday, and there was speculation on the possible impact of the strike on the arrival of key delegates, and on the already slow pace of the deliberations.
Several observers suggested that the strike begs the question: is the public really prepared to pay for climate policies?
